name: Bell Cellular Music
summary: A KOZ file contains a song downloaded for use on a Bell Cellular cell phone. Only certain cell phones that used Bell Cellular service, such as the Sanyo MM-7500 and Samsung A920, could play KOZ files. Bell Cellular users purchased music from an online store named Full Track Music.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Playable only on a supported cell phone
Not meant to be opened on a computer

macos.display_name: Not meant to be opened on a computer
